page.title: 07Filming.
page.content: Reepham is sometimes used for filming because it is an attractive old town and also because it is near the Anglia T.V studios and the B.B.C in Norwich. Shroud for a Nightingale was filmed in Reepham.Moor House was used as the nursing home. The road outside was closed down while they where filming for about a week.The Black Tower was filmed in Reepham as well.Dianes Pantry was used as a fruit shop.The market place,the Brewery House,the library and the solicitors where also used.The Black Tower and Shroud for a Nighingale are in the same series of stories written by P.D. James. Roy Masden,Pauline Collins and Martin Jarvis were the stars.The doorway of Rockery farm was used to film Burston School Strike. A girl in our school lives there now.
